QuestData.Title: Through the Portal
QuestData.Description: Ah, just the $c I wanted to see!$B$BWe've finally figured out why the portal is not working. We need more arcane powder!$B$BIt would take us months to get a shipment sent out to us, but luckily, the mogu on this island carry plenty for their own spells.$B$BThey tend to use some older stuff, so we're going to need a lot of it.
QuestData.RewardText: Excellent! Excellent!$B$BThis is just the stuff, $n.$B$BWe'll get to work right away. I have no doubt we'll be done very soon.
